text: The Express Tribune is a daily English newspaper in Pakistan. It is run by the Lakson Group media company. It is the only newspaper in Pakistan that works with the International New York Times, which is the worldwide edition of The New York Times. The newspaper is based in Karachi, but it also has offices in Lahore, Islamabad, and Peshawar. It started on April 12, 2010, and has a different news design compared to other Pakistani newspapers. ==References== == Other websites == *tribune.com.pk Category:English-language newspapers Category:2010 establishments in Pakistan
title: The Express Tribune
